2010-10-13

It makes me feel better #9 Pixies... back then

Damn if Pixies weren't just amazing back then... I saw them quite a few times between 89 and whenever they called it a day and (and saw Black Francis do a slightly rubbish - and insanely packed - solo show at The Borderline). Remember some great shows... even that last one at the Crystal Palace Bowl when it felt like it might have been all over...

Here's the proof... and they all look so young... (and skinny!)
